thread.title: Liam Maxwell Releases New Marketing Campaign for Prayer Book
thread.title_full: Liam Maxwell Releases New Marketing Campaign for Prayer Book - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Liam Maxwell Releases New Marketing Campaign for Prayer Book
text:
Author gifts readers with ‘365 Prayers A Year’ to strengthen their spiritual lives
BELFAST, Northern Ireland (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
What better way to start and end one’s day than with a quiet time with the Lord and a prayer? Author Liam Maxwell releases a new marketing campaign for his inspiring book that houses “365 Prayers A Year” (published by Xlibris UK). This introspective read helps readers strengthen their spiritual lives and enrich their daily journey.
Prayer can be a calming and empowering armor for anyone, everyday. With this book, readers are offered the chance to enrich their lives with such power and peace at the same time as they are offered one prayer a day, for the whole year. Offering readers a quiet aspiration for every day, followed by a positive quality that will serve as a guidepost for fulfilled living , and an inspirational message for a healthful and productive life, this guides readers to a better perception in life.
Containing a myriad of self-help techniques, each achieved through the power of prayer , “365 Prayers A Year” shows the merits of praying everyday and how it can change a person’s life for the better. The teachings in this were predominantly inspired by the author’s love for his family and his thankfulness for the life given to him by God.
“ 365 Prayers A Year ”
By Liam Maxwell
Softcover | 6x9in | 124 pages | ISBN 9781453570807
E-Book | 124 pages | ISBN 9781499090352
Available at Amazon and Barnes & Noble
About the Author
Liam Maxwell has been involved in the field of education since he was 20 years old. Prayer for him is a daily means of thanking and praising God for His constant help and protection. He currently resides in Belfast, United Kingdom.
Xlibris Publishing UK, an Author Solutions, LLC imprint, is a self-publishing services provider dedicated to serving authors throughout the United Kingdom. By focusing on the needs of creative writers and artists and adopting the latest print-on-demand publishing technology and strategies, we provide expert publishing services with direct and personal access to quality publication in hardcover, trade paperback, custom leather-bound and full-color formats. To date, Xlibris has helped to publish more than 60,000 titles. For more information, visit xlibrispublishing.co.uk or call 0800 056 3182 to receive a free publishing guide. Follow us @XlibrisUK on Twitter for the latest news.
